sentences.english: Next, an analysis of Professor Hsiao's commentary style in annotating lyric is followed, so as to see his great learning and personality.
sentences.chinese: 再者，分析萧先生的评赏风格，以见学人的襟怀气度。

sentences.english: Dr. Liu on the returned overseas Chinese students' outstanding projects recommendation of Zhongguancun Science Park.
sentences.chinese: 参加中关村科技园区留学人员精品项目推荐会。

sentences.english: Heads of the state ministries visit Beijing Overseas Students Pioneer Park.
sentences.chinese: 中央有关部委领导参观北京市留学人员创业园。

sentences.english: Lou was honored the Third Beijing Venture Award for Outstanding Overseas Returnees.
sentences.chinese: 曾荣获“第三届北京市留学人员创业奖”。

sentences.english: Dr. Tian receives the Second Beijing Venture Award for Outstanding Overseas Returnees.
sentences.chinese: 荣获第二届北京市留学人员创业奖。

sentences.english: She has been a lecturer of the Yunnan Radio and Television University for ten years.
sentences.chinese: 长期担任云南广播电视大学人文学院法学讲师。

sentences.english: You tried to teach me right from wrong .
sentences.chinese: 您费尽心机学人是非分明。

sentences.english: He was honored the First Beijing Venture Award for Outstanding Overseas Returnees.
sentences.chinese: 曾荣获“第一届北京市留学人员创业奖”。

sentences.english: Overseas Chinese scholars should possess a position in Chinese modern academic history.
sentences.chinese: 海外华裔学人在中国现代学术史上应占有一席之地。

sentences.english: This thoroughly comprehensively explaine its person ofitspoem for all previous dynasties study person to create has been—inconvenient.
sentences.chinese: 这为历代学人深入全面地解读其人其诗造成了不便。

sentences.english: The staff handles the application of starting-up business in Beijing for the overseas Chinese students.
sentences.chinese: 工作人员为留学人员办理来京创业工作相关手续。

sentences.english: Beijing authority funds prior sci-tech programs led by the overseas Chinese talents every year.
sentences.chinese: 北京市每年对留学人员科技活动进行择优资助。

sentences.english: Classes are held at the Tzu Chi College of Humanities and Social Sciences.
sentences.chinese: 上课地点为慈济大学人文社会学院语言教学中心。

sentences.english: A mature modern university should have good humane character of university.
sentences.chinese: 一所成熟的现代大学应该是拥有良好的大学人文品格。

definition: junior scholar or pupil in imperial China
ambitious despite a lack of talent (idiom)
Confucian study of ethics/study of Daoism/school for Daoism in Tang and Song times/Daoist magic/another name for 理學|理学, rational learning of Song dynasty neo-Confucianism
sinology/Chinese studies (in foreign schools)/Han Learning, a Qing dynasty movement aiming at a philological appraisal of the Classics
doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)
to write a book advancing one's theory (idiom)
